comments:

Actually not major since both places have a Browse button.

The problem was a bad assumption that the handled property would be set on all 
handlers.  This is fixed in CVS.
Verified in I20050215-2300 on Linux 2.6.10, KDE 3.3.2, GTK+ 2.4.14, X.Org 6.8.0
